summary: This is an email chain from December 17, 2020, regarding the logistics of sending a CD containing the 'Eighth Production' materials and its password to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) for Ghislaine Maxwell's case. It involves coordination between a paralegal specialist and other parties to ensure delivery to MDC counsel.

persons.name: Paralegal Specialist
persons.role: Paralegal Specialist at the U.S. Attorney's Office
persons.context: The individual who prepared and arranged for FedEx pickup of a CD containing the Eighth Production materials and its password for delivery to MDC counsel.

events.title: Delivery of Eighth Production Materials to MDC
events.description: A paralegal specialist arranges for FedEx pickup of a CD containing the Eighth Production materials and a separate CD with the password, intended for delivery to MDC counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell's case.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office, SDNY, 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: On December 17, 2020, the U.S. Attorney's Office was preparing to send discovery materials labeled as the 'Eighth Production' to the Metropolitan Detention Center.
The materials were sent on a CD with a separate password-protected CD, indicating sensitive or confidential content related to Ghislaine Maxwell's case.
The correspondence shows procedural coordination between legal staff for the secure transfer of case materials to detention center counsel.
